name: Set speed dial background image (Firefox only)
description: Allows setting a background image for this speed dial addon. Firefox only. Tested on win 7, Firefox 33.0.2.
additional_info: Image - Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 License. By SvenMueller on deviantart. Change image by changing the url in the CSS (See comments). Note: I have not tested it using dial groups. Please notify me if you have problems and I'll try to fix it.
